overview: The story revolves around the quarrels that occur between (Rajab) and his friends on the one hand, and between (Tolba) and his friends on the other hand. (Sami) falls in love with (Amal), Rajab’s sister, even though he is a follower of Tolba. (Nawal), her brother's fiancée, warns her of this relationship. Sami separates from Tolba and goes to Rajab to ask his sister, Amal, to marry him.
title: قصة الحي الغربي
